sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; function StateTable(props) { console.log("####", props.records[0].id) function currency(a) { return ( Intl.NumberFormat('ko-KO', { style: 'currency', currency: 'KRW' }).format(a) ) } return ( <> { props.records[0].date } { props.records[0].description } { props.records[0].method } { props.records[0].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[0].amount) } { props.records[0].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[0].payment) } { props.records[1].date } { props.records[1].description } { props.records[1].method } { props.records[1].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[1].amount) } { props.records[1].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[1].payment) } { props.records[2].date } { props.records[2].description } { props.records[2].method } { props.records[2].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[2].amount) } { props.records[2].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[2].payment) } { props.records[3].date } { props.records[3].description } { props.records[3].method } { props.records[3].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[3].amount) } { props.records[3].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[3].payment) } { props.records[4].date } { props.records[4].description } { props.records[4].method } { props.records[4].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[4].amount) } { props.records[4].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[4].payment) } { props.records[5].date } { props.records[5].description } { props.records[5].method } { props.records[5].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[5].amount) } { props.records[5].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[5].payment) } { props.records[6].date } { props.records[6].description } { props.records[6].method } { props.records[6].amount === "" ? null : currency( props.records[6].amount) } { props.records[6].payment === "" ? null : currency( props.records[6].payment) } ) } export default StateTable;
